body.value:
I'm always happy to discuss helping you and your team to do great things.

I am particularly interested in Drupal and LocalGov Drupal, and especially at the intersection of consultancy (what do we want) and implementation (how are we going to get there).

Projects I am Interested In

  • Helping you create a design system/style guide/starter kit
  • Improving your existing design system/style guide/starter kit
  • Ensuring your designer-to-developer handover process is seamless
  • Planning the implementation of your next project

Let's Get Connected!

The easiest way to contact me is via email to mark@mark.ie.
